channel.title: ██ Can you help me? ██
channel.description:
Okay, I have my client ready for putting in jar file.
I'm running a 317 PI and Im trying to make a webclient/client.jar file. I made it but when I put it on to my laptop and test it I'm getting "Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit."
Yes, I have made the correct manifest to client. My friend made one on his computer and it works fine. I tried to test a different jar maker and still the same. I'm not sure what can cause this. Someone please try to help me!!!

item.title: ██ Can you help me? ██
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody
item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

Okay, I have my client ready for putting in jar file.

I’m running a 317 PI and Im trying to make a webclient/client.jar file. I made it but when I put it on to my laptop and test it I’m getting “Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.”

Yes, I have made the correct manifest to client. My friend made one on his computer and it works fine. I tried to test a different jar maker and still the same. I’m not sure what can cause this. Someone please try to help me!!!
